item.source: (news article) I thought I would take a stab at a news update

item.title: (news article) I thought I would take a stab at a news update
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

  1. “but you can run your own server, and make be proud that you can. . .”
  • …?
  1. “Also, Aryan, a Runescape bot that made many people Runescape millionaires started up and died when it sent something impossible to the Runescape servers. It currently doesn’t work, nor will it probably ever work.”
  • What exactly did it send to the server that was “impossible”? I don’t recall anything like that.
  • You already stated it died so the “It currently doesn’t work, . . .” bit doesn’t need to be in there. Give more detail on Aryan if you can.

I dislike how you gave us an image, I can’t quote directly from the text so I have to rewrite it when I want to quote something.

Read full topic

item.title: (news article) I thought I would take a stab at a news update
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“kuiren, post:16, topic:65764”]Umm you need to start a paragraph with like 5 spaces right? Indentation i think

in·den·ta·tion (ĭn’děn-tā’shən) Pronunciation Key
n.
The act of indenting.
The condition of being indented.
The blank space between a margin and the beginning of an indented line.[/quote]

Its the key above Caps Lock.

Read full topic

item.title: (news article) I thought I would take a stab at a news update
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

bobby:

OK I will change that I am in 7th grade so I am not a very good speller/user of correct grammar.

Your writing has nothing to do with your age, or current year of school. It has everything to do with how resourceful you are. Can’t spell a word? Look it up in the dictionary. At that age you’ll obviously have the basic idea of how a word is spelled, so if you’re unsure then clarify it.

Read full topic

item.title: (news article) I thought I would take a stab at a news update
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Well,

It is full of grammar errors for one thing. Also it is kind of one big clustered paragraph. Each idea should have it’s own paragraph, and the proper written form for each would have an introduction and at least 3 body sentences and then a conclusion.

Read full topic
